name: Hodor
0:
”Alexa, tell Ho Door to hold the door”
”Alexa, tell Ho Door to carry Bran”
”Alexa, tell Ho Door he's loved”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ho door
des: Bring Hodor right to your home! Tell Hodor to do anything real Hodor would do, and get a 100% realistic, accurate response. It's like he's right there with you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
